title: School Address
content: Shiva Boys' Hindu College is located at Bonne Aventure Road, Gasparillo, Trinidad and Tobago.

title: School Contact
content: You can contact the school at (868) 650-1873 or via email at shivaboyscollege@gmail.com.

title: Environmental Club
content: The Environmental Club, also known as the Envi Club, raises awareness on environmental issues and organizes eco-friendly activities at the school.

title: Mission Statement
content: Our mission is to provide a holistic education rooted in Hindu philosophy and to develop academically competent, morally upright, and socially responsible individuals.

title: Principal’s Welcome
content: Our Principal welcomes all students and stakeholders, encouraging a spirit of excellence and community throughout their academic journey.
